sentences.english: Cathaya argyrophylla is relic plant from the third glacial period, which has great research value.

sentences.english: How do you do? Your brother left his bag of film on the ferryboat. I found it.

sentences.english: The Marine Department sends boats to clear the rubbish and oil on the sea every day.
